item.title: CVE-2024-34755|2024-05-17T09:52:39.756Z -- CRM Perks -- Integration for Contact Form 7 and Salesforce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for Contact Form 7 and Salesforce.This issue affects Integration for Contact Form 7 and Salesforce: from n/a through 1.3.9.
